arts.ttl: Report: Julen Lopetegui to now bring 'exceptional' West Ham player back into the starting XI to face Manchester United
Former Arsenal star slams 'disgusting' Man United decision as Erik ten Hag problem exposed
arts.sum: Manchester United's decision to part ways with Sir Alex Ferguson, has been widely condemned by former players and pundits

arts.ttl: Man City officially break Man Utd's Champions League record - but fans aren't having it
arts.sum: Manchester City broke a Champions League record on Wednesday night by extending their unbeaten run to 26 games - but the validity of their achievement has been questioned by some

arts.ttl: Man Utd fans STUNNED by Ten Hag's Fenerbahce squad
arts.sum: Manchester United supporters have been left stunned at the squad Erik ten Hag has picked for the Red Devilsâ€™ Europa League clash with Jose Mourinhoâ€™s Fenerbahce on Thursday. Speaking prior to the game, Mourinho claimed that Man Utd have nothing to fear from his side, yet fans of the Old Trafford club do not appear reassured by the travelling squad named by the Premier League outfit for the match.

arts.ttl: Man United in fresh Erik ten Hag replacement theory as dream January transfer plan emerges
arts.sum: Manchester United face Fenerbahce in the Europa League on Thursday as Erik ten Hag's team seek a first win in Europe this season

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho wants belated Man Utd Premier League title with Man City dig
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho has suggested he wants to be retrospectively awarded the 2017/18 Premier League title when his Manchester United side finished runner-up to Manchester City. Despite his various domestic league titles and two Champions League triumphs, Mourinho famously claimed in 2019 that the second place finish with United was one of his best managerial achievements amid the limitations and hurdles he said he was facing.

arts.ttl: Thursday's Transfer Talk Update: Antony, Marcus Rashford, Bruno Fernandes
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Man Utd make final Antony transfer decision as Â£86m flop's vow falls on deaf ears
arts.sum: Manchester United winger Antony has endured a torrid time since his mega-money deal to Old Trafford and his vow to produce better results this season has been hit by a lack of opportunities

arts.ttl: Fenerbahce vs Manchester United score predicted as Europa League fixture sees late drama
arts.sum: Manchester United face Fenerbahce in the Europa League on Thursday evening so we simulated the clash to predict the final score.

arts.ttl: 'I had to leave Man Utd when Jose Mourinho arrived - things just weren't the same'
arts.sum: While Jose Mourinho did deliver trophies at Manchester United, it wasn't enough for Wayne Rooney who admitted he wanted to leave Old Trafford while playing under the Portuguese manager
